entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow or rain. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%
